abstract: Two items in the news last week underscore that the likelihood for a signature case arising out of the financial crisis is near zero.
snippet: Two items in the news last week underscore that the likelihood for a signature case arising out of the financial crisis is near zero.
lead_paragraph: As has been noted many times, the lack of criminal prosecutions arising out of the financial crisis has been painfully obvious. And two items in the news last week underscores that the prospect for a signature case is growing even more distant.

headline.main: Dim Prospects for Financial Crisis Prosecutions
